songs.title: This Is How We Do (Brillz Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
This is how we do, this is how we do
This is how we do, this is how we do, this is how we do
This is how we do
This is how we do
This, this, this
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do-do-do-do-do

[Drop]
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
Yeah, we do it like that
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do
This is how we do-do-do-do-do-do-do

[Drop]
This is how we do, yeah
Wait, no-no-no bring the beat back
The beat, beat, beat bring the beat back
This is how we do
The beat, beat, beat bring the beat back
This is how we do-do-do-do-do-do-do
This is how we do

This is how we do
B-B-Bring the beat back
This is how we do

Do it like that
Do it like that
Do-do-do it like that
This is how we do
The beat, beat, beat
The beat, beat, beat
The beat, beat, beat
This is how we do
